title: Drawing, "Designs for two doorknockers", ca. 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, gray, black and rose-colored wash, ruled border in pen and black ink on white laid paper
inscribed: Inscription, pen and black ink, at left: bouton profils heurtoire, ou Marteaux vu de face profils bouton
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Knocker seen in right profile in the form of an arabesque decorated with acanthus leaf motifs. Rosette button fills center of S-curve.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for two doorknockers", ca. 1780.
ca. 1780. Pen and black ink, gray, black and rose-colored wash, ruled border in pen and black ink on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-185.
